Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillcrest Drive, between the Allisk Manor and the Cattle Ranch.
Room.LongDescription: The large cattle ranch to the south provides much of the meat required by a city the size of Oceancrest. The cattle are raised on the ranch to the south and then brought over to the Slaughterhouse across the street to be humanely destroyed and then packaged for consumption. The farmers are always in need of a few more cattle slaughterers at the Slaughterhouse off of Appleton Road, but do not approve of killing their cattle on the ranch.
